Poland close to being able to end Ukraine border blockade, says PMPoland's government is getting close to ending a blockade by truckers of several border crossings with Ukraine, the prime minister said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 14:50:52 GMT L2BJ3S4UGBOH3H7YI2VGPRKJLM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-close-being-able-end-ukraine-border-blockade-says-pm-2023-12-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Taylor Swift fan died of heat exhaustion at Rio concert, police sayThe death of a young Brazilian fan who fell ill at a concert by U.S. singer Taylor Swift in sweltering Rio de Janeiro last month was due to heat exhaustion, police said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 14:45:44 GMT V47BLRA6YNJY7FQX4ZS6E52RPM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/taylor-swift-fan-died-heat-exhaustion-rio-concert-police-say-2023-12-27/Rodrigo Viga Gaier世界美洲
Iran, Russia to trade in local currencies instead of US dollar - state mediaIran and Russia have finalised an agreement to trade in their local currencies instead of the U.S dollar, Iran's state media reported on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 14:38:08 GMT H622OLQ4DJKINDARZ3XMHL52XE https://www.reuters.com/world/iran- Russia-trade-local-currencies-instead-us-dollar-state-media-2023-12-27/Reuters世界
Ukraine probes alleged prisoner of war execution by Russian forcesUkraine has opened a war crimes investigation into the alleged execution by Russian forces of three Ukrainian prisoners of war, the general prosecutor's office said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 14:29:29 GMT DSIJ5VMHZVM2PN5OWOTV4VDXIE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-probes-alleged-prisoner-war-execution-by-Russian-forces-2023-12-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Turkey's Erdogan says Israeli PM Netanyahu no different from HitlerTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Wednesday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was no different from Adolf Hitler and likened Israel's attacks on Gaza to the treatment of Jewish people by the Nazis. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 14:06:07 GMT UEEEWJLGPRJ35ODLZJDHLFE4PU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkeys-erdogan-says-israeli-pm-netanyahu-no- Different-hitler-2023-12-27/Reuters世界中东
Turkey tells U.S. to keep promises on F-16 sale -sourceTurkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan told his U.S. counterpart Antony Blinken in a call on Wednesday that Turkey expected the United States to act in line with their NATO alliance and keep its promises on the sale of F-16 fighter jets to Ankara, a Turkish diplomatic source said. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 14:04:36 GMT GYJJDHFTWRPKPACG23LIQVIGSI https://www.reuters.com/world/turkey-tells-us-keep-promises-f-16-sale-source-2023-12-27/Reuters世界
Mourners chant 'Death to Israel' at Revolutionary Guards adviser funeralMourners chanted "Death to America, Death to Israel" during the funeral service on Wednesday for a senior adviser in Iran's Revolutionary Guards who was killed in an air strike in Syria. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 13:55:33 GMT 76WSLVS6YRNB7KII24DYO37YEY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mourners-chant-death-israel-revolutionary-guards-adviser-funeral-2023-12-27/Alaa Al-Marjani And, Ahmed Saeed世界中东
Michigan Supreme Court rejects attempt to remove Trump from 2024 ballot -documentThe Michigan Supreme Court declined to hear an appeal from voters seeking to disqualify Donald Trump from next year's presidential primary for his role in the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 13:55:04 GMT LK2PSOQTI5LLJBLQP7C7ZDOTWE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/michigan-supreme-court-rejects-attempt-remove-trump-2024-ballot-cnn-2023-12-27/Reuters世界美国
Palestinians work to identify 80 dead handed over from IsraelIsrael has handed over the bodies of 80 Palestinians killed in the conflict in Gaza, the Palestinian Ministry of Health said on Wednesday after they were buried and the authorities recorded details to help with later identification. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 12:47:05 GMT OBKZWVMYIZOY7HGVIHL5QQT2SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-work-identify-80-dead-handed-over-israel-2023-12-27/Reuters世界中东
Kremlin says EU aid to Ukraine will harm Europe's economy, won't change outcome of warThe Kremlin said on Wednesday that any fresh European Union aid to Ukraine would not affect the outcome of the conflict there and that such spending would only hurt Europe's economy. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 12:31:21 GMT S3HSD4VSAZIXPLY4BBPMJ4EAXI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-says-eu-aid-ukraine-will-harm-europes-economy-wont-change-outcome-war-2023-12-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Indonesian protesters storm refugee shelter calling for deportation of RohingyaA large crowd of Indonesian students stormed a convention centre housing hundreds of Rohingya refugees from Myanmar in the city of Banda Aceh on Wednesday, demanding they be deported, Reuters footage showed. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 11:45:40 GMT I5B6IFNSRZNHXGWUOBOLPPW6AE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesian-protesters-storm-refugee-shelter-calling-deportation-rohingya-2023-12-27/Reuters世界亚太地区
